Boots of the Planes

boots (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 260
horrormark chance [taint]: 50%
spell [itemspell]: #996 Teleport
inferno return [infernoret]: 20%
kokytos return [kokytosret]: 20%
chance to be banished to void [voidbanishchance]: 1%
(ethereal [eth])

Requires 40S to forge (S5)

These boots allow the wearer to pass through the very fabric of reality. He can step through rifts in space and travel great distances in a single bound.
